reasoning: Catastrophic injuries on both sides create massive under edge. Pacers missing Siakam (23.2 PPG) + Haliburton (season-ending). Wizards missing Sarr (16.9 PPG). Combined 40+ PPG missing from normal rotations. Injury-adjusted total of 205.7 vs line of 232.5 = 26.8 point edge. H2H historically lower-scoring with only 26% of games going over 220 at full strength.

76ers missing 42.2 PPG (Embiid + George both out). Injury-adjusted total of 218.8 vs line of 236.5 = 17.7 point edge. Even accounting for variance, this is a massive gap. Hawks won both meetings this season but those were high-scoring - tonight's depleted 76ers roster cannot replicate that offensive output.
